revision.text: ==English== {{wikipedia}} ===Etymology=== Borrowed from {{bor|en|cmn|-}} {{zh-m|雅樂|lit=elegant music}}. {{doublet|en|gagaku|aak}}. ===Noun=== {{en-noun|-}} # {{lb|en|music}} A form of [[Chinese]] ritual music performed at [[imperial]] [[court]]s since the Zhou Dynasty, and usually associated with [[Confucianism]]. [[Category:en:Musical genres]]
